title: Gordy’s Home!
description: The infamous ’90s sitcom about the Houstons, a family of space enthusiasts, and their chimp, Gordy.
altHero: an Asian boy and a chimp fist bump in front of a telescope and night’s sky
alt1: a family of four and their chimp on their way to go fishing
alt2: Gordy the chimp in a bellboy’s uniform lifting a cloche to reveal a banana underneath and giving a thumbs up
alt3: the dad dressed as a skyskraper and holding a pie
alt4: the young Asian boy hiding under the dining table
